review: Installation was so quick and easy.  The first two movies everything worked perfectly.  Then the problems began.... I have free trial to Prime but now it doesn't want to let me watch anything on Prime. Ugh!!! And, my internet connection appears to be too slow so I can't watch anything now!!!! Not real happy right now.
author: Nanci M. Smith

review: If you have wifi connection get rid of cable or only use it for wifi.Excellent content on the stick
author: Richard

review: I'm finding myself having to force my Fire tv stick into the hdmi port, it seems it's slightly too big. This can cause damage to the television. Idk if this is a defective unit or a problem with all of the units
author: Aaron Rickards

review: Easy to set up and use!!
author: Marion Long

review: Perfect! does what I want. Only complaint is that amazon prime should really give you free access to all videos and movies. Or maybe have a plan that allows for that.
author: Clint

review: Great product, super easy setup. Love it.
author: Donovan M.

review: Really useful, accomplished all my expectations
author: Matias Hernandez Martinez
